blogPost.excerpt: A list of 9,000 badly executed products and apps. Are you looking for project ideas? Then this list could be useful to you. - 2,599 iOS Apps - 1,226 Chrome Extensions - 240 Web Apps (from ProductHunt) - 4,999 Android Apps Airtable access + JSON files
blogPost.body: A list of 9,000 badly executed products and apps. Are you looking for project ideas? Then this list could be useful to you. - 2,599 iOS Apps - 1,226 Chrome Extensions - 240 Web Apps (from ProductHunt) - 4,999 Android Apps Airtable access + JSON files
blogPost.title: Validated ideas 2.0 - 9,000 popular but poorly executed apps
blogPost.author: Huszko Jozsef

localize.description: 9000个执行不佳的产品和应用程序的列表。您在寻找项目创意吗？那么这份清单可能会对你有用。-2599个iOS应用-1226个Chrome扩展-240个Web应用(来自ProductHunt)-4999个Android应用Airtable Access+JSON文件
localize.tagline: 9,000个受欢迎但执行情况不佳的应用程序

localize.description: 9000個執行不佳的產品和應用程序的列表。您在尋找項目創意嗎？那麼這份清單可能會對你有用。-2599個iOS應用-1226個Chrome擴展-240個Web應用(來自ProductHunt)-4999個Android應用Airtable Access+JSON文件
localize.tagline: 9,000個受歡迎但執行情況不佳的應用程序

previous.excerpt: A simple application that allows you to generate various copy with just a prompt. Its use ranges from summarizing long text, answering questions, completing thoughts and writing articles. The tool is powered completed by OpenAI's GPT-3 algorithm.
previous.title: Virtual Ghost Writer - AI copy writer powered by OpenAI

localize.description: 一个简单的应用程序，只需提示即可生成各种副本。它的使用范围包括总结长篇文本、回答问题、完成思想和撰写文章。该工具由OpenAI的GPT-3算法完成。
一個簡單的應用程序，只需提示即可生成各種副本。它的使用範圍包括總結長篇文本、回答問題、完成思想和撰寫文章。該工具由OpenAI的GPT-3算法完成。

next.excerpt: Record Screen or Webcam and Share instantly. No need to install any application. Just super fast recording and share. Live Streaming Feature to be added very soon. Super fast recordings to give feedback to your team, education, creating product demos.
next.title: Record Webcam + Screen > Share - Simple Screen + Webcam Recording. Share after recording

localize.description: 录制屏幕或网络摄像头，并立即共享。无需安装任何应用程序。只是超快的录制和分享。即将添加直播功能。超快录制，为您的团队、培训、创建产品演示提供反馈。
localize.tagline: 简单的屏幕+网络摄像头录制。录制后共享

localize.description: 錄製屏幕或網絡攝像頭，並立即共享。無需安裝任何應用程序。只是超快的錄製和分享。即將添加直播功能。超快錄製，爲您的團隊、培訓、創建產品演示提供反饋。
localize.tagline: 簡單的屏幕+網絡攝像頭錄製。錄製後共享
